title: MWC 2022: Russian Tech Companies Banned From Attending Amidst Ukraine War - News18
content: MWC 2022: Russian Tech Companies Banned From Attending Amidst Ukraine War  News18
description: MWC 2022 is finally up and running this year in Barcelona after a two-year hiatus because of the pandemic, and the event is looking to keep things in control over the global situation.
